TextView.android:text: Garden Hall (this hall can be used for parties, banquet and corporate events up to 70 persons) Atmosphere The atmosphere of a country house with a veranda overlooking a flowery and sunny garden, is the leitmotif of the new hall. The new format involves the continuous enjoyment of dishes in the atmosphere of a show-kitchen: business lunches from the chef Vitaliy Kossenchuk in the daytime, liqueurs and pickles from the cellar with favorite hits performed live by charming singer. A gourmet grocery is open here for 24 hours, where you can buy your favorite canned vegetables and fruits, preserves, pickles by our own cooking and exotic foods and drinks as well.
